org.apache.hivemind.impl
Class TranslatorContribution

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hivemind.impl.BaseLocatable
      org.apache.hivemind.impl.TranslatorContribution
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.hivemind.Locatable, org.apache.hivemind.LocationHolder
public class TranslatorContribution
extends org.apache.hivemind.impl.BaseLocatable

A contribution to the hivemind.Translators configuration point. The configuration point defines the available translators that may be used in XML conversion rules ... however, a number of "bootstrap" translator (such as class - ClassTranslator ) are hardcoded (and doesn't appear in the configuration point).

Author:
Howard Lewis Ship
